title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 3019/95 of 20 December 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 setting export refunds on fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No  3019/95 of 20 December 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 setting export refunds on fruit and  vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 are hereby replaced by  Annexes I and II hereto respectively.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX I
'ANNEX I RATES AND QUANTITIES LAID DOWN FOR THE ALLOCATION OF LICENCES WITH ADVANCE FIXING OF THE REFUND >TABLE>
ANNEX II
'ANNEX II INDICATIVE RATES AND QUANTITIES LAID DOWN FOR THE ALLOCATION OF LICENCES WITHOUT ADVANCE FIXING OF  THE REFUND >TABLE>
